private.tooltip: A private picture is only accessible when you are logged in your account

unlisted.tooltip: An unlisted picture is not visible on your profile, it can only be accessed knowning the link

public.tooltip: A public picture is listed on your profile and visible to everyone

about.first_paragraph: Scinna is an open-source, self-hosted screenshot and picture sharing server designed to be used with Scinnapse, Scinna CLIent, and Scinnamon.
about.second_paragraph: The goal of this project is to provide a simple way to make it's own picture sharing server and to have a fully-featured client on all platforms.
